page.title: 06OUR SCHOOL FOOTBALL TEAM.
page.content: These are the members of the team. {1.Adrian Crowther}a brave goalkeeper prepared to dive at players feet. {2.Andrew Elliott,}central defender and Captain,has scored 13 goals,a good defender.{3.Bruce Martin,}right back,scored 2 well deserved goals,has a good future in football.{4.Mark {Smith,}left back,first season in the team.Good defending,didn't score.{5.Duncan Berridge,}good fast winger, can cross a ball.{6.Paul {Tindall,}young determined player, managed to score a goal.{7.Simon {Rolands,}right wing,scored two good goals.{8.Adam Perkins,}a very useful striker, uses the ball well,scored 19 goals.{9.Sub,}Scott Messon,another young determined player.We won 4 games,lost 1 and drew 3, and therefore {won the league.}A very successful season!
